tasks.label: RUN: Dry-run plan
tasks.command: docker run --rm -it                   --user 1000:121                   -e ROOT_DIR=/data                   -e MASTER_DIR="MobileBackup"                   -e SOURCE_DIR="Google Fotos"                   -e DRY_RUN=1                   -e PHASH_THRESHOLD=8                   -e QUALITY_ORDER="raw,heic,jpeg,png,other"                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos:/data:rw                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos/.reports:/out:rw                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos/.quarantine:/quarantine:rw                   alex/photo-smart-merge:latest

tasks.label: RUN: Apply plan
tasks.command: docker run --rm -it                   --user 1000:121                   -e ROOT_DIR=/data                   -e MASTER_DIR="MobileBackup"                   -e SOURCE_DIR="Google Fotos"                   -e DRY_RUN=0                   -e PHASH_THRESHOLD=8                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos:/data:rw                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos/.reports:/out:rw                   -v /volume1/@home/alex/Photos/.quarantine:/quarantine:rw                   alex/photo-smart-merge:latest
